ygData.subject: Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: Since I m the one that kinda started the whole int/mana thing, I went back to my old character who only had an int of 64 and that couldn t cast leering corpse
ygData.messageBody:
Since I'm the one that kinda started the whole int/mana thing, I went back
to my old character who only had an int of 64 and that couldn't cast
leering corpse when I was playing him. Well, when I tried to cast it I
could. I was still the same level(10) as I was when I quit the character.
I have heard rumors that Veriant was going to change the mana for Paladins
and Sk's because it was to low. I guess they did. This my be why some
people could cast it at 9 or 10 and others couldn't. Don't know. Thought
this might be useful.

Oh, I love our pets. I gave mine a 2h weapon, and about 50% of the time,
it would hit between 1-19. I was hitting for around 19 and my bash(they
change bash to level 6 now) was doing around 5. So when everything went
right for one round of combat it was 19, 19, 5. I must say I was going
through monsters left and right. I was really impressed.

-Nuluk (E'ci)
